SELECT * FROM TstCustomField o WHERE o.orgId=#{orgId}
AND o.disabled!=TRUE AND o.deleted!=TRUE ORDER BY ordr ASC

SELECT * FROM TstCustomField o
WHERE o.id = #{id}

select cf.myColumn from TstCustomField cf
where cf.orgId = #{orgId} and cf.deleted = false and cf.disabled = false
order by cf.myColumn asc
select max(ordr) from TstCustomField o where o.orgId=#{orgId} and o.deleted != true and o.disabled != true
SELECT * FROM TstCustomField o WHERE o.ordr < #{ordr} AND o.orgId = #{orgId} AND o.deleted != TRUE ORDER BY o.ordr DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM TstCustomField o WHERE o.ordr > #{ordr} AND o.orgId = #{orgId} AND o.deleted != TRUE ORDER BY o.ordr ASC LIMIT 1
